Don't cry because you're stupid. Cry because other people are. And believe me, they are.
Tears come from realizations of my own incompetence or inadequacies.
If I've learned anything from my brief existence is that I rarely do something correctly on my first attempt. Carelessness is a vice.
I have moderate to little understanding of statistics. After taking 4 courses that is still true.
